dictionary.lore: According to a legend from another world, there was once an incredibly strong and chivalrous man who faced an arduous trial set by a wise sage only to barely escape with his life. Swearing revenge upon the sage, the man who had survived dedicated the rest of his life to honing his skills as a warrior. Using every single opportunity at his disposal to overcome the limits of his swordsmanship and eventually grow to challenge even the gods in expertise, he came to regret but one thing about the path he had chosen: the fact that he himself had turned into the sage he so despised.

62350.name: Sage's Mercy

62360.desc: Enormously boosts BC, HC drop rates, 50% boost to max HP, considerably boosts Atk, Def when BB gauge is over 50%, boosts BB Atk and adds all elements to attack for 2 turns when BC collected exceeds certain amount & fully restores HP for 1 turn when HC collected exceeds certain amount

dictionary.lore: Although it grants its wearer incomparable power, this fiendish helm also causes the various emotions of the battlefield to be felt deeply and lastingly. Once engaging in battle, its bearers are gradually poisoned by a fever for combat. In time, they find themselves hurtling toward a heroic death. However, were a bearer able to tame this seemingly-cursed power with an iron will, they would become the storied conqueror of an era.

62360.name: Conqueror's Helm

62370.desc: 80% boost to Atk, max HP, hugely boosts elemental damage, enormously boosts Spark damage for 2 turns when damage dealt exceeds certain amount & enormously boosts damage against status afflicted foes

dictionary.lore: A weapon brought back to Elgaia from a dead world by a certain god. It is said to hold all of the knowledge of its home world, and to grant wielders instant knowledge of all actions required to disable any foes they face. Realizing that the world died because of this weapon, the god sealed it away deep within his temple. It is said that even when war broke out between humanity and the gods, he did not permit the seal to be broken.

62370.name: Omniscient Blaster

62380.desc: Negates all status ailments, 60% boost to Def, max HP, 50% Spark damage reduction, 50% additional damage reduction & probability of resistance against 1 KO attack

dictionary.lore: A crystal imbued with divine energies by a monk on a pilgrimage in another world. The monk is said to have visited extreme environments inaccessible to normal individuals in this quest in order to gather divine energy. Though accounts linger across the land even now, the earliest and latest written accounts span over one thousand years. Some scholars contend that the crystal's power may have extended the monk's life for such a duration.

62380.name: Reverence Crystal

62390.desc: 80% boost to max HP, activates at turn's end BB gauge boost each turn effect at turn's start instead, enormously boosts BB gauge each turn, 20% damage reduction for 1 turn when damage dealt exceeds certain amount & negates critical and elemental damage for 2 turns when damage taken exceeds certain amount

dictionary.lore: A scourge believed to have been used to punish prisoners in the Agni Empire. As all of these prisoners died with peaceful expressions on their faces, in time it came to be revered as a sacred object. However, it was later discovered that the whip was a profane relic that heightens suffering and madness in those it strikes. It was then promptly sealed away, deep underground. One theory holds that a certain queen was involved in the whip's creation.

62390.name: Insidious Lash

62400.desc: 150% boost to Spark damage, Spark damage boosts BB gauge and restores HP & adds probable Spark critical, slight reduction to damage from all types and considerably boosts Spark damage for 1 turn when Sparks exceeds certain amount

dictionary.lore: The legends of one world tell us that there once was an archer who excelled in rapid-fire, point-blank combat. It was said that she could fire at an enemy locked in combat with an ally in a chaotic melee, and always strike only the enemy without fail. She only grew more accurate with each foe she slew, and she left the battlefield strewn with a corpse for each arrow she carried. As she put it, so long as she had a trusted friend to work with, she could slay any foe.

62400.name: Bow of Battles

62410.desc: 60% boost to all parameters, 10% damage reduction & negates critical and elemental damage

dictionary.lore: Heavenly robes bestowed upon a shrine maiden who was deeply connected to the gods in ancient times. The robes hold the power to make any who wear them into a divine being, and those with strong spiritual faith are said to gain the same awareness as the gods. In time, the shrine maiden awoke to some unknown truth and departed, never to be seen again. Since that time, a goddess virtually indistinguishable from the shrine maiden's description has appeared to rescue humans from grand disasters.

62410.name: Vestments of Faith

62420.desc: Enormously boosts BB Atk, hugely boosts elemental damage, hugely boosts critical damage, 200% boost to Atk & raises max Atk value from 99999 to 200000

dictionary.lore: A legendary demon blade said to be able to bring down any massive foe in a single strike. It is said that even a scratch from its blade will instantly devour life force from the wound, earning it the nickname "Death's Blade." It is also said that the blade secretly draws its power from numerous demons sealed within it, and that one can faintly hear an eerie, hair-raising wailing when it is nearby.

62420.name: Annihilator Blade

63000.desc: Considerably boosts critical hit rate, hugely boosts critical damage, 30% boost to all parameters & boosts elemental damage

dictionary.lore: This Sphere was developed at the Summoners' Research Lab, but Noel restricted the disclosure of information on it due to the magnitude of its powers. It holds the power to greatly enhance its bearer's destructive capacity, but advanced skills are required to make full use of its abilities. Bearers were unable to control its power in tests, and many are said to have injured themselves.

63000.name: Unyielding Device

64000.desc: 45% boost to all parameters, boosts all elemental damage & hugely boosts BC, HC drop rates

dictionary.lore: A precious stone very rarely discovered in the depths of a certain world. It is believed to be created from the crystallization over many long years of the power that circulates through that world. It is said to considerably enhance the potential of those who touch it, and enable them ascertain the many different elements and flows of power that make up the world. Furthermore, some among them are said to even understand their own destiny that awaits them.

64000.name: Empyrean Gem

64001.desc: 120% boost to Spark damage, 20% boost to Spark damage for 3 turns when Sparks exceed certain amount & considerably boosts critical damage

dictionary.lore: A halberd believed to have been created by the war god Diacles in order to destroy opposing gods. It absorbed the gods destroyed by Diacles, and even now is said to contain their power. Since many different divine powers are mixed together, it is considered to be extremely difficult to wield, but it also has the ability to resonate with any kind of power, and can amplify its force considerably.

64001.name: Diacles Halberd

64002.desc: Raises max Atk value from 99999 to 150000, considerably boosts BB Atk & boosts Atk, Def, Rec when BB gauge is over 50%

dictionary.lore: A sword said to have been created from the gathered light of stars by ancient gods long ago. Any who takes hold of it is said to be able to display great strength beyond what would be considered their limits. Some believe that, were it wielded by a divine being, it could destroy many worlds in one fell swoop. Upon realizing the sword's destructive power, which far exceeded expectations, it's believed the gods decided to seal it away on a distant world known to no one.

64002.name: Holy Starblade

65000.desc: Probable Paralysis effect, 30% boost to Atk & boosts damage against status afflicted foes

dictionary.lore: This blade was made from materials gained from the wicked dragon Avlansch, who was created out of concentrated water magic by Natra, the deity of shadow. With its flowing curves and clear blue-white blade, many who look upon it are struck with awe. But the blade still holds the evil spirit of Avlansch despite its beautiful appearance. Accordingly, it is said to have the terrifying power to paralyze anyone it cuts via its inherent freezing temperature.

65000.name: Ice Dragon Blade

65010.desc: 攻撃力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＨＰが半分以下の時、攻撃力をアップ＆弱点属性ダメージをアップ
65010.name: バルムンク

65020.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加＆攻撃力を２０％アップ＆ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をアップ
65020.name: ジークフリード

65030.desc: 防御力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆全状態異常を無効＆攻撃力・防御力・回復力を低下する効果を無効
65030.name: 盤古の龍骸

65040.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆攻撃力を２０％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
65040.name: 妖剣ダーインスレイヴ

65050.desc: 被ダメージを５％軽減＆防御貫通効果を無効＆防御力を２０％アップ
65050.name: 聖天杖レラスティマ

65060.desc: スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加・ダメージを５０％アップ＆スパークが一定数を超える度に３ターン、攻撃力を少しアップ
65060.name: スマッシュ＆マジック

70000.desc: Shows where the Boss is on the map for a short period of time.

dictionary.lore: A bullet that applies a special glowing pigment made from an Acute Eye on its target. A Summoner is able to detect the glow even from a distance, thus it is often used among the Demon Slayers when they work in teams. The Demon Slayers are also given a basic gun to fire the bullet, but the gun does not have great range nor power, so it does not inflict any damage on its target.

70000.name: Beacon

dictionary.lore: A pellet that creates a smoke screen by taking advantage of properties of Smoky Drops. The special smoke not only obstructs one's field of sight, it makes it impossible to detect any scents or traces of magic as well. Unfortunately, as its effects affect the senses of its user as well, it can't be used in ambushes, and is only useful for escape from tough enemies. When faced with a formidable monster, sometimes retreating is the only option.

A catalyst that allows any Summoner to use teleportation magic. However, it does not allow its user to teleport freely, only towards a preset portal and is often used by the Demon Slayers as a means of rapid travel. Although it isn't perfect, the process of creating this potion which produces highly refined magic is only disclosed to a few Summoners and its distribution to the public is strictly restricted.

70300.desc: Slightly replenishes the HP of all allies in the surrounding area.

dictionary.lore: An extract from the Mow Nut, it was mixed with a Cure and crystallized into an incense. This incense stabilizes the spirit, and has the ability to cure any wounds that the soul itself may have suffered. It has the power to heal Demon Slayers for a short time, but it takes a lot of preparation to burn, and thus an exclusive burner is required. However, any error committed when processing this incense can result in dangerous ingredients, and thus it is not available for common use.

70300.name: God Crystal

70400.desc: 10% boost to Atk for all allies on the map for 5 minutes. Up to 4 may be used simultaneously.

dictionary.lore: An extract from the Mow Nut, it was mixed with an Atk Potion, refined, and then crystallized into an incense. The aroma from this incense incites one's fighting spirits, and has the ability to increase one's attack power on the battlefield. Since one mistake when using this incense can lead one to go berserk, the common folk, and the usual Summoner are forbidden to use it. However, due to its effective properties, there are probably Demon Slayers out there at this very moment surrounding an incense burner in order to prepare for the battlefield.

70400.name: Atk Crystal

70500.desc: 10% damage decrease for all allies on the map for 5 minutes. Up to 4 may be used simultaneously.

dictionary.lore: An extract from the Mow Nut, it was mixed with a Def Potion, and crystallized into an incense. Its aroma has the ability to increase one's defensive power. Similar to other crystallized types of incense, when the instructions for its burning are not followed to the letter, it can have a bad effect on the user, and thus permission to use this item is only granted to Demon Slayers currently on duty. Furthermore, the side effect of this crystal is said to be extreme devitalization.

70500.name: Def Crystal

70600.desc: Identifies the location of undiscovered bosses for some time.

dictionary.lore: Made by using Brown Grass, the light that this eye shines is amplified to cover a very long distance, making it a catalyst for magic that can very well be considered clairvoyance. The light that it shines has a particular purpose. It can penetrate any object, and stretch over any distance, reflecting off any strong spirits that it encounters. It is said that since this item came into use, Demon Slayers have been able to locate the dens of demons more quickly.

70600.name: Detector

90001.desc: 10% boost to Def and Rec, 30% boost to max HP, negates Curse, Paralysis, Weak effects & boosts BB gauge fill rate
90001.name: Dreadnought Shell Aleph

90101.desc: 50% boost to Atk, 100% boost to Spark damage, Spark damage slightly boosts BB gauge & negates Curse, Paralysis, Injury effects
90101.name: Mem Cache

90102.desc: Greatly boosts Spark damage and drop rate of BC and HC
90102.name: Buccaneer Banner

110000.desc: A crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Seria
110000.name: Ruby

110001.desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Seria
110001.name: Grand Ruby

110010.desc: A crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Karl
110010.name: Sapphire

110011.desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Karl
110011.name: Grand Sapphire

110020.desc: A crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Lugina
110020.name: Emerald

110021.desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Lugina
110021.name: Grand Emerald

110030.desc: A crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Paris
110030.name: Topaz

110031.desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Paris
110031.name: Grand Topaz

110040.desc: A crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Tilith
110040.name: Opal

110041.desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Tilith
110041.name: Grand Opal

110050.desc: A crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Grahdens
110050.name: Amethyst

110051.desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Grahdens
110051.name: Grand Amethyst

110060.desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Owen
110060.name: Grand Garnet

110070.desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Ark
110070.name: Twin Stones

110080.desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Reda
110080.name: Memory Spinel

110100.desc: A mysterious stone that allows Units to surpass the gods' power
110100.name: Legend Stone

120000.desc: Multiplies experience by 1.5 after Quest is cleared
120000.name: Experience Token

120001.desc: Multiplies experience by 2 after Quest is cleared
120001.name: Experience Badge

120010.desc: Multiplies Item drop rate by 1.5 after Raid Quest is cleared when activated from map
120010.name: Fortune Box

120011.desc: Multiplies Item drop rate by 2 after Raid Quest is cleared when activated from map
120011.name: Fortune Coffer

130000.desc: 使用後３０分間、クエストクリア時の獲得経験値が１.５倍になる
130000.name: 経験の水

130001.desc: 使用後３０分間、クエストクリア時の獲得経験値が２倍になる
130001.name: 経験秘水

130010.desc: クエストクリア時の獲得経験値が１.５倍になる
130010.name: 経験の丸薬

130011.desc: クエストクリア時の獲得経験値が２倍になる
130011.name: 経験霊薬

dictionary.lore: Once there was a country that witnessed a shower of stars. Their fall is said to have led to the blooming of flowers in the desert, and even the purification of toxic lakes. Thereafter the king sent his men to every region in the land to investigate this phenomenon. They found what was apparently a fraction of one of the fallen stars, and its composition and shape were made of minerals unknown to the region. Believing it to be a gift from the gods, the king placed the stone upon his crown, and established a peaceful reign that would last for over 18 generations.

230004.desc: 25% boost to Rec, max HP & probability of slight HP absorption

dictionary.lore: There once was a great temple where a holy statue was revered. One day, the statue began to weep tears of blood. The tears formed beautiful jewels when they dried, and touching them was believed to bestow blessings of long life as well as spiritual and mental healing. The people began to pray to them. Afterwards, the temple's cleric died by mysterious causes, and the statue began to weep tears of blood once again. All at once, the people of the area began to fear the statue, and sealed it deep beneath the earth along with its jewels.

230004.name: Noble Blood Gem

230005.desc: 30% boost to Rec and max HP, restores HP each turn & damage taken may slightly restore HP

dictionary.lore: Saint Tracion grieved. She grieved for the many lives lost to the unending, senseless wars within her nation. She went on a hunger strike to save her people, praying for them, and dying before her time. The gods that pitied Tracion bestowed a charm upon her adherents. Legends hold that the people's hearts became tranquil and they ceased their violence against one another when Tracion's adherents presented it as an offering at the temple.

230005.name: Worship Charm

230006.desc: 40% boost to Rec, max HP, considerably restores HP each turn, damage taken may slightly restore HP & boosts Rec when HP is under 50%

dictionary.lore: There once was a knight who lived in a faraway land. This knight wore a ring that symbolized the love and affection he shared with the pixie Nallia. This ring also endowed him with the power to recover from any wound. He used the ring's magic to win glory in battle, and on doing so, he became engaged to the queen of the nation he served. However, on the day of their wedding, he removed the pixie's ring. In that instant, the nation's enemies stormed its gates and annihilated it completely. The pixie's ring has not been seen since.

230006.name: Spirit Band

230007.desc: 50% boost to Rec, max HP, greatly restores HP each turn, damage taken may slightly restore HP, boosts Rec when HP is below 50%, hugely boosts BC, HC drop rates & boosts BC, HC efficacy

dictionary.lore: A ring that appears through scattered references in poems. In an ancient era, a goddess fell in love with a human youth. However, one day the youth was conscripted for a hopeless battle. The goddess exchanged her own life to create a ring that would ward off death, and gave it to her beloved. It is said that under the goddess's protection, the youth and his companions went on fighting no matter how many injuries they sustained, and in the end succeeded in protecting their homeland.

230007.name: Ring of Protection

230103.desc: 20% boost to Atk & boosts BB gauge each turn

dictionary.lore: Once there was a knight who would carry this flag with him to every battle. According to a legend inscribed on a stone fragment, whenever the knight raised his flag beams of light would shine down from the heavens, and those following him into battle would be led to victory by the great power and courage it granted them. The whereabouts of this flag were unknown until a certain piece of information was found claiming that a disciple had taken possession of it. Without any further details, however, that claim remains disputable.

230103.name: Sacred Flag

230104.desc: 25% boost to Atk, boosts BB gauge each turn & 50% boost to Spark damage

dictionary.lore: A girdle bestowed upon a gladiator in the Agni Empire by the empress at the time, as a reward for the gladiator's meteoric rise in the arena. Any man who wears this girdle will gain the strength of a savage beast and set unprecedented records. The original gladiator was eventually granted an audience with the empress, but vanished mysteriously several days later. The girdle was later taken up by the next champion, but it is said that its color had changed to a dark red at that point.

230104.name: Power Girdle

230105.desc: 30% boost to Atk, considerably boosts BB gauge each turn & 75% boost to Spark damage

dictionary.lore: In the distant past, this sword was only granted to history-making champions in the Arena. Just holding this blade heightens the wielder's spiritual focus, and it is said to allow strikes so rapid that opponents cannot retaliate. However, the invincible strength it bestows on wielders also robs them of all eager opponents. Accordingly, it was eventually sealed away beneath the Arena and labeled as a forbidden weapon.

230105.name: Forbidden Blade

230106.desc: 40% boost to Atk, Def, considerably boosts BB gauge each turn, 100% boost to Spark damage & slightly boosts critical hit rate

dictionary.lore: A torture implement once used with loving care by a sadistic young tyrant. The gods attempted to visit numerous punishments upon this tyrant for his loathsome ways, but the tyrant forced his magician to transform the torturer's needle into a decoy. It drew off the gods' curses, leaving him unharmed. The needle gained fearsome power as the gods' wrath passed through it time and again, eventually becoming a weapon so destructive it could threaten the gods themselves.

230106.name: Wrathful Needle

230107.desc: 50% boost to Atk, Def, considerably boosts BB gauge each turn, 100% boost to Spark damage, boosts critical hit rate, probable Spark vulnerability infliction for 2 turns & boosts BB Atk for 1 turn when Sparks exceed certain amount

dictionary.lore: This talisman was created out of the desire for distinguished military exploits. The owner of that talisman died in battle as a price for his heroic feats. The talisman then passed hands to the one who killed him, and after outstanding achievements on another battlefield, they too lost their life. The next owner and the one after also died in battle after their many deeds won them acclaim. After countless warriors gave their lives for this talisman, it came to be said that the spirit of a war god dwelled within it.

230107.name: Heroic Serydelic

230203.desc: 20% boost to Def & deters status ailments

dictionary.lore: This candlestick is believed to have been made by a cynical Summoner who was exploring an unknown world. The magical undying flame burning from its wick guarded its owner from evil, providing generations of Summoners with hope and protection with its light. Its abilities have been upgraded overtime, however, now rendering it able to guard both its owner and those surrounding him or her as well.

230203.name: Guarding Light

230204.desc: 25% boost to Def, increases resistance to all status ailments & slightly reduces elemental damage

dictionary.lore: Gauntlets used by the white ogres, a minority race in Estria. Made from precious ores and purified by shamans, they are later passed on to individuals by the tribal chieftain as part of a coming-of-age ceremony. As the white ogres hunt with light equipment, these gauntlets are ideal for defense without sacrificing agility, and for reducing weak points. They are also said to have increased the white ogres' success in hunting in hilly areas and forests.

230204.name: Ogre Gauntlets

230205.desc: 30% boost to Def, negates all status ailments & reduces elemental damage

dictionary.lore: Once upon a time, a small minority fought to protect its tribal holy land against countless invaders. The tribe passed down this sinister, misshapen helmet from generation to generation, and its chieftains always wore it while leading at the battlefront. The tribe's soldiers would gain absolute confidence upon seeing this, as it symbolized their people. Meanwhile, it is said to have instilled the fear of death in enemies and weakened their morale.

230205.name: Myrmidon Helm

230206.desc: 40% boost to Def, negates all status ailments, reduces elemental damage & probable slight damage reduction

dictionary.lore: A scepter passed down over generations in the ancient kingdom of Lagfarita. Though Lagfarita had enjoyed peace for many years, barbarian tribesmen began to raid its borders. Lagfarita's soldiers struggled to withstand the mighty barbarians, and the border provinces fell one after another. Then, one day it came to an end when the king brandished this scepter and all the barbarians' attacks were rendered ineffectual. The tide of the war turned suddenly, and Lagfarita was able to drive off the barbarians at last.

230206.name: Warding Scepter

230207.desc: 50% boost to Def, max HP, negates all status ailments, reduces elemental damage, probable 20% damage reduction, considerably boosts BB gauge when guarding & boosts damage reduction when guarding

dictionary.lore: There once was an otherworldly kingdom named Akbutecca. In that kingdom within a world already completely destroyed, there lived a famous general called the “Sacred Shield.” He took on otherworldly invaders, and making full use of all types of military tactics and strategies, he thwarted every line of attack and eventually forced them to abandon the invasion. It is thought by some that the people of this kingdom knew of a secret ritual to inherit souls, and the general's soul is said to pass into whoever wears this crown.

230207.name: Akbutecca Crown

230303.desc: Restores HP each turn & damage taken may restore HP

dictionary.lore: General Vadom was known as a determined and courageous warrior, who according to legend, created this protective gem to enhance his vitality. With justice and fairness as his personal code, Vadom despised assassinations and dark rumors, and was never afraid of a confrontation. No matter the situation, he never turned his back on this enemies, which inspired a great sense of morale in his troops. He is said to have been resurrected countless times whilst fighting on the frontlines.

230303.name: General's Gem

230304.desc: Restores HP each turn, damage taken may slightly restore HP & boosts BC, HC drop rates

dictionary.lore: The sorceress Poliaf was in love. She loved a man that she only dreamed of, a skilled and affectionate healer. She used all forms of magic to search for a man just like him, but never succeeded in the end. Later on, however, a protective charm she created demonstrated surprising restorative effects. She interpreted this as a token of love from the man of her dreams, and is said to have never let it leave her grasp again.

230304.name: Affection Charm

234000.desc: 30% boost to Atk & probable random status ailment infliction

dictionary.lore: There is one forbidden text renowned as both holy and profane. Its contents remain unknown, but one individual's dormant powers are known to have awakened upon reading it. Yet another was unable to contain the knowledge within it, and drowned in a sea of soliloquies, consuming even the people around him. Rumors hold that this book is present in the Imperial Library's catalog, and that the spirit that manages the library has successfully read it.

234000.name: Taboo Grimoire

235000.desc: 25% boost to all parameters, damage taken may slightly boost BB gauge & probable boost to BB gauge when attacking normally

dictionary.lore: The mantle that sealed the Mystical Wolf's proud, royal soul, it's said to hold part of the Wolf's immense power. It heightens all the senses in those who wear it. Also, in addition to imbuing its wearer with an unyielding will to fight, it imparts the ability to respond calmly and rationally in any situation. An individual wearing this cape is able to continue fighting undaunted no matter the circumstances.

235000.name: Lupine Mantle

235001.desc: 35% boost to all parameters, hugely boosts critical damage & reduces BB gauge required for BB

dictionary.lore: An experimental Sphere created by studying parts of automatons encountered at the Abandoned Temple. It has the power to greatly enhance all of the bearer's fundamental attributes. As it does not cause any physical strain, current theory holds that it calculates its bearer's latent abilities and forcibly awakens them. As it is a recycled technology, precise answers will require additional study.

235001.name: Automated Warrior

235002.desc: 45% boost to all parameters, Spark damage slightly restores HP & slightly boosts BB gauge when damage taken has exceeded certain amount

dictionary.lore: Armor made by rearranging the remains of an enchanted puppet. Researchers have confirmed that it has the power to greatly enhance the wearer's basic attributes. Construction of such an item requires remains from an enchanted puppet that still hold traces of the Divine Armor's power, making mass production nearly impossible. The Summoners' Hall holds almost all suits of this type of armor currently known to exist, and utilizes them for research into the mysteries of the sealed gods.

235002.name: Armored Soul

235003.desc: 60% boost to all parameters, boosts Atk relative to remaining HP, boosts Def, Rec when HP is low, & hugely boosts all elemental damage

dictionary.lore: An ornament that was modeled after accessories worn by the two gods who served under the Holy Emperor. Even though it is an imitation, it has the power to raise one's basic abilities to a superhuman level, as if to show the great difference between gods and humans. Furthermore, various forms of protection are activated depending on the circumstances, as if to reflect the spirit of the two different gods, who were trusted more deeply than the Holy Emperor himself. Many believe this grants the ornament power to guide the wearer straight to victory.

235003.name: Tourayet Adornment

235004.desc: 60% boost to all parameters, damage taken hugely boosts BB gauge, considerably boosts Atk, Def, Rec when BB gauge is over 50%, hugely boosts BB gauge each turn & considerably boosts BC efficacy

dictionary.lore: There once was a race that read the future in the stars. One night, they observed a new star in the heavens. It was an ill omen, signifying the race's impending doom. Resolving to resist this fate, their young leader donned their traditional red garb and made his way to the battlefield. Inspired by the young leader's courage, a miraculous victory was seized from the jaws of defeat. Their legends tell us that they abandoned prophecy from that point onward, choosing instead to forge their own fates.

235004.name: Star-Catcher

235005.desc: 60% boost to all parameters, hugely boosts critical damage, reduces BB gauge required for BB, enormously boosts BB Atk & critical damage enormously boosts Spark damage for 3 turns

dictionary.lore: Machinery discovered in Ohbanahara consistently displays a distinct design philosophy and heightened individuality when compared to other machinery. However, as the technology itself is now lost, the otherworldly investigation office has attempted to reproduce it. This equippable Sphere is one such successful attempt. It boasts the ability to greatly enhance the powers of all neighboring allies, along with the wielder. It is particularly well-suited to mass enemy elimination, for which it could be called optimal.

235005.name: Mechani-Shell

235006.desc: 60% boost to all parameters, Spark damage restores HP, enormously boosts BB gauge and slight damage reduction for 2 turns when damage taken exceeds certain amount & damage taken may restore HP

dictionary.lore: A magically-enhanced armor developed from further research into the remains of Rokkzalm's demon puppets. Though less heavily armored than the Armored Soul, it features a crystal in its center which consists of the concentrated essence of the Divine Armor. This enhances its performance in all fields far beyond that of the Armored Soul. Its developer has stated that the loss of physical defense was a sacrifice required in order to heighten the Sealed God powers imbued in the piece.

235006.name: Adamant Soul

235007.desc: 60% boost to all parameters, considerably boosts Atk relative to remaining HP, considerably boosts Def, Rec when HP is low, hugely boosts all elemental damage & negates elemental damage

dictionary.lore: Replicas of accessories worn by the Divine Ten on a higher plane. Though these are mere imitations made based on text references, even they have the power to enhance a bearer's abilities to near-godlike levels. References tell us that the originals were bestowed upon the Divine Ten by the Holy Emperor, and that the bearers wore them as symbols of their loyalty.

235007.name: Ascendant Bangle

235008.desc: 60% boost to all parameters, 120% boost to Spark damage, 15% damage reduction from all types, considerably restores HP and hugely boosts BB gauge each turn & negates critical damage

dictionary.lore: Mystical medicine believed to be derived from the core of a certain demon. Routine use grants power equivalent to that of the gods. However, the demon whose body was used in its production remains largely a mystery, and the medicine itself is still in the testing stage due to concerns over side effects. Both the Summoners' Hall and the Federation are believed to be producing the substance in secret. In particular, the Federation representative is said to have murmured, "it's a first step" upon seeing the drug's effects.

235008.name: Ultraboost Serum

236000.desc: 30% boost to Atk and Def & considerably boosts BC drop rate and slightly boosts BB gauge during Spark

dictionary.lore: There once was a god of human prosperity that lived in another world. This god loved wine more than anything, and preferred to collect any wines that humans would not drink. Legends hold that the god later traveled the land, granting blessings to wine-producing regions. Rumors also hold that this god would grant divine might to any who could finish a cup of its wine, endowing them with immense physical and spiritual power.

236000.name: Ambrosia Wine

236001.desc: 50% boost to Atk, Def, max HP, Spark damage considerably boosts BC drop rates and boosts BB gauge, considerably boosts BB gauge when damage dealt exceeds certain amount & considerably boosts OD gauge fill rate

dictionary.lore: A sacred mirror given by a god in recognition of a country's royal family. That family is thought to have been entrusted with the country's governance by the god, but its authority declined with each generation. In the midst of this decline, the country was invaded by a demon and plunged into crisis. The emperor by that time was merely an ordinary person, but seemed transformed and displayed astonishing ability the moment he looked into this sacred mirror. He is said to have gone on to command an army and successfully drove out the demon.

236001.name: Glittering Mirror

237000.desc: 25% boost to max HP & 10% damage reduction from Fire, Water, Earth, Thunder types

dictionary.lore: The residents of one other world have a traditional ritual that venerates a being they call a "holy god." In the ritual, the people gather around a bonfire that represents the god to express their gratitude. Legends hold that the bonfire is home to spirits that burn away all manner of curses, and that anyone who plunges into its flames will gain a portion of the holy god's power. The bonfires used in this ritual are said to transform into beautiful crystals upon the ritual's conclusion.

237000.name: Holy Beacon

238000.desc: Boosts Atk, Def, Rec when HP is over 50%, 10% reduction to damage from Light, Dark types & boosts HC efficacy

dictionary.lore: Regalia believed to have been worn by a sect in ancient Grand Gaia that worshiped a being who was neither god nor demon. Legends tell us that the object of their worship was a rainbow-winged dragon who possessed power greater than a god or a demon. Fearing their expansion, the gods launched an assault against the sect. However, the sect continued to pray to the dragon as long as they could, and their regalia is said to have gained the power to deflect even assaults from the gods.

238000.name: Rainbow Regalia

238001.desc: 50% boost to max HP, considerably boosts Atk, Def, Rec when HP is over 50%, 10% damage reduction from all types & considerably restores HP for 3 turns whenever HP is below 50%

dictionary.lore: A sacred relic excavated from the ruins of a certain otherworldly temple. It is thought that a god granted this precious chalice as a reward for people's good faith, and that when pious believers put their lips to it, they were able to gain the powers they wished for. Thus the people believed in the gods more and more, and the precious chalice gained more power in response to their faith. The sense of faith continued to accumulate in the precious chalice, until it eventually came to contain greater power than even the gods themselves.

238001.name: Lefaire Chalice

239000.desc: 100% boost to Atk, Def for first 3 turns, boosts BC efficacy & damage dealt boosts BB gauge

dictionary.lore: This masterfully crafted sword is said to have been forged from sunlight in the distant past. In crafting it, the master smith also sacrificed his own life. It was made to slay a demon that cloaked itself in shadowy defenses and held unmatched power, and the smith entrusted it to a swordmaster upon completion. The demon sneered on seeing the blade, saying that its light would only shine for an instant. However, the tales tell us that the swordmaster cleaved through the demon's defenses and sliced it in two in the instant before the blade's light dissipated.

239000.name: Sunblade

dictionary.lore: A shiny piece of gold that has been polished and shined by a craftsman, could be sold for a high value.

800001.desc: A valuable piece of polished crystal stone

dictionary.lore: A prized piece of jewel that has been polished and shined by a craftsman, could be sold for a high value.

800001.name: Prized Jewel

800002.desc: Coin that could fetch a decent amount of Zel

dictionary.lore: A small rounded piece of gold, a trading substitute used by outlaws instead of Zel. Fetches decent amount of Zel.

800002.name: Gold Coin

800003.desc: A  rare glimmering hide. Unique crafting material.

dictionary.lore: The hide of an ancient creature clear as a mirror, but which glimmers with immense colors. There had been rumors that the hide had come from an illusive creature of old that had the ability to vanish in an instant, rendering only the most skilled ancient hunters able to kill one. Some say it had been some sort of horse, but no one has been able to identify it. Once killed, its body incinerates to ashes leaving behind only its shiny hide.

800003.name: Rainbow Hide

800004.desc: The chipped piece of a unicorn's horn. Unique crafting material.

dictionary.lore: Chipped off from a unicorn's horn, this shard holds magical and medicinal properties. Herbalists grind it for medicine to cure diseases, while elemental craftsmen enchant accessories and weapons with its energy for increased luck and blessings.

800004.name: Unicorn Shard

800005.desc: The chipped piece of a minotaur's horn. Unique crafting material.

dictionary.lore: Chipped off from a minotaur's horn, the shard holds an aura of intense energy. It is said that being in contact with it for too long can affect one's mood and temper. Some artisans and craftsmen use its intense energy to strengthen armor and weapons.

800005.name: Mino Shard

800006.desc: An extremely durable material mined from the depths of the earth. Unique crafting material.

dictionary.lore: Adamite can be found in the depths of underground caverns, and is said to possess a mysterious energy harnessed from the earth's core. It is extremely durable and often mined for crafting battle armor, even though it is often hazardous to traverse deep into the earth.

800006.name: Adamite Shard

800007.desc: The remains of a fallen star. Unique crafting material.

dictionary.lore: As falling stars blaze through the heavens, they smash into the land's surface with such force that they disintegrate into fine dust. Conjurers and healers often harvest it, as it contains cosmic energy that can greatly enhance their craft. Common folk keep it in a bottle as a blessing from the heavens.

800007.name: Star Dust

800010.desc: Pure water infused with lunar magic

dictionary.lore: Clear water infused with lunar energy throughout a long, clear night sky. There is a legend of the full moon staring at its own reflection on the stagnant water surface. Mesmerized by its own beauty, it silently transferred some of its spirit into its own reflection.

800010.name: Moonlit Essence

800011.desc: A pouch filled with cooking necessities

dictionary.lore: Spice pouches are usually prepared by travelling merchants and peddlers, filled with various cooking ingredients and seasoning. They are often traded to adventurers as a travelling necessity for spicing up their meals while traversing for days outfield before reaching their destination. Having a good meal is great for the mind and soul!

800011.name: Spice Pouch

800012.desc: A type of firefly that glows in the shimmering yellow hue of the moon

dictionary.lore: This typical type of firefly emerges every year during the fullest moon, attracted to the intense lunar energies projected from the night sky. Their mysterious yellow glow is rumored to be some sort of communication through the astral field where the moon's consciousness resides.

800012.name: Moon Bug

800013.desc: An undying flame that doesn't burn nor scotch

dictionary.lore: Undying flames are said to combust mystically out of nowhere during certain times of the year when astral energies in the air are overwhelming. They can be shifted and moved by physical bodies and objects. These mysterious flames draw their aura from alternate dimensions that are filled with unlimited amounts of energy across the Vortex. Some adventurers prefer it as a light source due to its dim glow that doesn't attract attention.

800013.name: Undying Flame

800014.desc: Drop formed from the dew around the area where the Vortex emerges

dictionary.lore: As the Vortex emerges through summonings and the crossing of planes by Summoners, its elemental aura energizes the droplets around it, causing their purity to shimmer. They are hard to come by, but are said to have revitalizing powers.

800014.name: Miracle Drop

dictionary.lore: A revitalizing festive treat that is enjoyed by all.
A traditional Mid-Autumn festive treat. A revitalizing and indispensable delicacy.

800017.desc: Revives one ally from KO status to 75% HP

dictionary.lore: Also known as "Tears of the Moon." A drop of this Crescent Dew into the eye of a fallen hero could initiate a moonlit revival.

800017.name: Crescent Dew

800100.desc: The bone of a deceased cursed one. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: Cursed bones are usually found near places where powerful evils reside. Once belonging to heroes and commoners alike, they are now what remains of the cursed and marked for death.

800100.name: Cursed Bone

800101.desc: The remains of a fallen star. Unique crafting material.

dictionary.lore: A drop of evil that comes from a powerful dark being. It harnesses the essence of mischief, fear, insanity and folly.

800101.name: Evil Drop

800102.desc: The remains of a fallen evil being. Unique crafting material.

dictionary.lore: Dust filled with evil essence, the burnt remains of a once powerful evil being.

800102.name: Heinous Dust

800103.desc: Heals all abnormalities of one ally

dictionary.lore: Trick or Treat! Trick or Treat!!! Candy is good for health. It's customary to give treats to children in costumes when they visit your house. Don't forget to give them a scare as well!

800103.name: Candy Treat

800104.desc: A strange piece of glowing crystal that holds a rare power.

dictionary.lore: A strange piece of glowing crystal that holds a rare power. It was created from the memories of a Knight of Grandshelt who is eager to defend her friends, no matter where their travels may take them.

800104.name: Memory Fragment

dictionary.lore: A scroll containing forbidden magic.

800106.desc: A special quartz infused with elemental power and radiates a soothing aura

dictionary.lore: A special quartz infused with elemental power and radiates a soothing aura

800106.name: Radiant Quartz

800107.desc: 50% boost to Atk, Def, Rec for all allies on the map for 5 minutes. Up to 4 may be used simultaneously.

dictionary.lore: A chunk of rock retrieved from the remains of an Orebi Revenant. Its unassuming appearance belies its innate magical properties that can only be harnessed by a Summoner.

800107.name: Revenant Fragment

800200.desc: A pretty snow flake, cool to the touch. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: A snow flake that shines softly with a blue glow. Mystical energy surrounds it.

800200.name: Snow Flake

800201.desc: Crystal shards that are synthesized with mystical Snow Flakes. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: These crystal shards are the work of condensing mystical Snow Flakes together. They glow blue and have an aura of mysterious energy surrounding them.

800201.name: Snow Crystal

800202.desc: A gemstone filled with the frozen essence of magic. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: Snow Gemstones are crafted through the tedious work of synthesizing Snow Crystals with extreme precision. The technique used to cut these chilled crystal stones causes them to reflect light as if they illuminate themselves. A precious material sought by ice mages.

800202.name: Snow Gemstone

800203.desc: A frosted drop of condensed winter essence with magical properties. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: During the day when the sun comes out and melts the ice and snow a little, sudden gusts of chilling storm winds flash freeze these melting dews. The mysterious and magical ice glades then keep the frozen dew from melting ever again.

800203.name: Miracle Frost

800204.desc: The frozen heart of a creature. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: Frozen hearts are rare to find, and can only be found on creatures that thrive in harsh, cold lands. For as long as they have survived, their hearts have slowly crystalized, changing them into cold and vicious creatures. Arctic hunters laugh at the irony of vicious creatures having a beautiful heart, for frozen hearts glimmer with a mystical beauty.

800204.name: Frozen Heart

800205.desc: The frigid soul of a beast, frozen through dark arts and magic. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: They say that when beings have passed on, their souls leave their bodies to another dimension and place. But some souls that have been cursed and trapped by powerful arcane masters before death are not able to redeem themselves, remaining imprisoned and frozen for eternity.

800205.name: Frozen Soul

dictionary.lore: A tasty festive treat.

800207.desc: A gemstone filled with good wishes. Extremely valuable when sold, but also a unique synthesis material.

dictionary.lore: Aspiration stones are enchanted gemstones of an unknown element which bear immense beauty. It is rumored that they are synthesized and blessed by the gods themselves, eventually scattered by them across the lands. They are of valuable worth and many are willing to pay a high price to get one, believing that possessing the item brings great luck. Craftsmen are known to synthesize them into powerful artifacts with the right ingredients.

800207.name: Aspiration Stone

dictionary.lore: A delicious pepper flavored treat for those with a sweet tooth. It is a snack most fitting of the holiday season.

800210.desc: Typically used as a household ornament, this wreath is a symbol of winter's festive spirit.

dictionary.lore: Typically used as a household ornament, this wreath is a merry decoration used by people to celebrate the festivities of the winter season. Some claim that the holidays can prove rather dull without one.

800210.name: Holiday Wreath

800211.desc: Filled with toys, candy, and other goodies, this bag contains an assortment of enjoyable presents.

dictionary.lore: Filled with toys, candies, and other goodies, this bag is full of presents that fill the heart with joy. One is certain to receive at least one of the gifts waiting inside, even if its just a lump of coal!

800211.name: Gift Sack

800212.desc: A small toy in the shape of a soldier. It bears a strong resemblance to a mysterious figure.

dictionary.lore: A small wooden toy shaped like a soldier standing at attention. Curiously, it bears a strong resemblance to a mysterious figure. It serves many boys and girls quite well in their little games, and gives parents peace of mind as it stands vigilant against the terrors of the night.

800212.name: Wooden Soldier

800213.desc: A shiny badge for those who have proven their courage.

dictionary.lore: A shiny badge made to adorn the chest of those who have proven their courage. Regardless of its design, it is worn by young and old alike.

800213.name: Toy Badge

800300.desc: A recovered stolen packet. Redeem at your nearest merchant for Zel!

dictionary.lore: A monetary token traditionally presented at social and family gatherings during the Chinese New Year.

800300.name: Small Red Packet

800301.desc: A recovered stolen packet. Redeem at your nearest merchant for Zel!

dictionary.lore: A monetary token traditionally presented at social and family gatherings during the Chinese New Year.

800301.name: Medium Red Packet

800302.desc: A recovered stolen packet. Redeem at your nearest merchant for Zel!

dictionary.lore: A monetary token traditionally presented at social and family gatherings during the Chinese New Year.

800302.name: Big Red Packet

800303.desc: An auspicious artifact. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: An auspicious artifact believed to bring good luck to any home that houses it.

800303.name: Embroidered Ball

800304.desc: Replenishes a Unit's HP over 3 turns

dictionary.lore: A tasty festive fruit enjoyed by all.

800304.name: Mandarin Orange

dictionary.lore: A tasty festive treat. People believe that eating Nian Gao during this festive season brings them greater fortune and luck all year long.

800306.desc: A symbol of ripe old age. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: A mythic dew that is formed by the hopes and dreams of generations of aspiring hard working people. No one knows how it is formed, but the one who posses it is said to enjoy life a little while longer.

800306.name: Longevity Dew

800307.desc: All you need is a pinch of this to make it big. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: As a new year approaches, the wind brings along a wave of pink mist in the air. Many harvest the pink mist and crystalize it into an essence, forging a gemstone that invites good luck and prosperity.

800307.name: Prosperity Essence

800308.desc: Jem Replica created by Nice Burny

dictionary.lore: Jem Replica created by Nice Burny

800308.name: Jem

800309.desc: This charm brings happiness and good fortune to the bearer.

dictionary.lore: This charm brings happiness and good fortune to the bearer. In ancient times it was also a symbol used to ward off evil spirits.

800309.name: Happy Charm

800310.desc: Coins such as thesehave a long history of bringing good luck.

dictionary.lore: Coins such as these have a long history of bringing good luck. Popular belief has it that coins with a hole in them bring even more luck!

800310.name: Lucky Coin

800311.desc: A feather dropped from the most majestic of birds.

dictionary.lore: A feather dropped from the most majestic of birds. Myth has it that you can harness the power of life from them.

800311.name: Phoenix Feather

800312.desc: Casts Water shield on all allies for 2 turns.

dictionary.lore: A crispy cookie that contains words of wisdom. Some swear by the prophecies they obtain from them.

800312.name: Fortune Cookie

800313.desc: Boosts one ally's max HP by 40%.

dictionary.lore: A tasty pastry for those with a sweet tooth. Pineapple tarts symbolize that prosperity is arriving!

800313.name: Pineapple Tart

800315.desc: Nyami's favorite pudding. Tastes so good that it puts one in a food coma.

dictionary.lore: Painstakingly crafted by the finest chef in Eneroth for the annual National Artistic Candy League. Nyami hid under the judges' table for three days and three nights before managing to swipe it out of the Queen's hands. She managed to barely escape by throwing premium quality salt into the eyes of the royal guards, making a clean getaway!

800315.name: Nyami's Pudding

800316.desc: A salt crystal obtained from the depths of Grand Gaia.

dictionary.lore: The finest salt obtained from the depths of Grand Gaia. Legends say that the salt deposits of Grand Gaia grow larger every time a special gate opens.

800316.name: Salt

800400.desc: A pure white flower. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: A beautiful flower that is commonly used as decoration during celebrations.

800400.name: Lilium

800401.desc: A deacon's bell. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: A bell that, when rang, is said to raise the spirits of all who hear it.

800401.name: Ascension Bell

800402.desc: Believed to bring the bearer good luck!  Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: Folklore says if you collect enough of it; something good will happen, just remember it didn't work for the rabbit.

800402.name: Rabbit's Foot

800403.desc: Increases the drop rate of materials for 3 turns.

dictionary.lore: A delicious, colourful cupcake that is found lying around. Some people say a mysterious hare in clothing leaves them behind.

800403.name: Rainbow Cupcake

800404.desc: Casts non-elemental shield on all allies for 2 turns.

dictionary.lore: A jewelled egg crafted by a famous goldsmith of otherworldly skills. Opening one reveals a hidden surprise that is sure to delight the beholder.

800404.name: Adorned Egg

800405.desc: A sweet concoction that shines with the unmistakeable hint of magic.

dictionary.lore: A sweet concoction that shines with the unmistakeable hint of magic. Some people have used to make desserts for a special holiday that has been lost to the mists of time.

800405.name: Magic Chocolate

800406.desc: A tart candy that shines with the unmistakeable hint of magic.

dictionary.lore: A tart candy that shines with the unmistakeable hint of magic. Consuming too many of these may cause tooth decay, gum problems, and mild flights of fancy.

800406.name: Magic Candy Bits

800407.desc: A special egg that glows with the unmistakeable hint of magic.

dictionary.lore: A special egg that glows with the unmistakeable hint of magic. Kindly handle this with caution, and whatever you do, do not use it to make scrambled eggs.

800407.name: Cracked Egg

800408.desc: A nutritious vegetable that contains concentrated amounts of magic.

dictionary.lore: A nutritious vegetable that contains concentrated amounts of magic. Do not feed this to cybernetic bunnies, unless you have their firmware update ready.

800408.name: Gaian Carrot

800409.desc: The special component to making your very own mechanized bunny.
800409.name: Bunny Core

800410.desc: Casts Thunder shield on all allies for 2 turns.

dictionary.lore: A delicious slice of a dessert best savored slowly with tea. Of course, you can't have just one slice now, can you?

800410.name: Carrot Cake

800411.desc: Gives one ally the power to withstand an attack which would normally knock them out.

dictionary.lore: Specially decorated eggs that have the sheen of magic in them. You can find them all over Grand Gaia, but be warned: they can give you the ride of your life.

800411.name: Mystical Eggs

800501.desc: A hardy stone that protects its bearer.

dictionary.lore: A hardy stone that protects its bearer. It draws strength on its owner's desire to protect others, and thus cracks easily when they are found lacking.

800501.name: Litrock

800502.desc: The ashes of burnt spiritwood trees.

dictionary.lore: The ashes of burnt spiritwood trees said to be imbued with a holy power, and to protect those who pray for their hopes and dreams.

800502.name: Heaven's Ash

800503.desc: A large crystal fueled by esper energy.

dictionary.lore: A large crystal fueled by esper energy. They are quite rare and only activate when heroes are nearby.

800503.name: Sacred Crystal

800504.desc: A mysterious powder left by spirits in their wake.

dictionary.lore: A mysterious powder left by spirits in their wake. It is said to reveal both one's future and fears when it is burnt.

800504.name: Spiritsand

800505.desc: A heavy crystal fueled by esper energy.

dictionary.lore: A heavy crystal fueled by esper energy. They are extremely rare and said to only call out to those deemed worthy.

800505.name: Holy Crystal

800506.desc: A strangely glowing crystal that holds a memory of courage.

dictionary.lore: A strangely glowing crystal that holds a memory of courage belonging to a Knight of Grandshelt. It evokes memories of friendship, laughter, and home.

800506.name: Courage Fragment

800507.desc: Boosts drop rate of materials for 3 turns.

dictionary.lore: A potion that brings luck to those who consume it.

800507.name: Lucky Potion

dictionary.lore: A sinister-looking mixture that offers protection against Dark energy.

800509.desc: Activates Dark Barrier for all allies.

dictionary.lore: An ominous concoction that protects Summoners and common people alike from Dark forces.

800509.name: Dark Vial

800601.desc: A magical flower that glows bright in the face of true love.

dictionary.lore: This magical flower glows bright in the face of true love. The stronger the bonds of love, the brighter the glow.

800601.name: Glowing Rose

800602.desc: A magical bow that glows when wielded by the pure of heart.

dictionary.lore: A magical bow that glows when wielded by the pure of heart. First wielded by a famous archer by the name of Cupid, it is said that he always strike true.

800602.name: Enchanted Bow

800603.desc: A magical arrow that strikes through the hearts of its targets.

dictionary.lore: A magical arrow that strikes through the hearts of its targets. Seemingly harmless, this arrow is known to be able to string two targets together.

800603.name: Love Arrow

800604.desc: An embroidered handkerchief from the kingdom of Krung-go.

dictionary.lore: In the kingdom of Krung-go, many artisans still practice the art of hand embroidery. A pair of mandarin ducks is a symbol of love and marriage.

800604.name: Silk Handkerchief

800605.desc: One half of a love pendant, lonely and incomplete.

dictionary.lore: One half of a love pendant, lonely and incomplete.

800605.name: Broken Pendant

800606.desc: A pair of matching heart pendants that fit perfectly together.

dictionary.lore: A pair of matching heart pendants.Together they fit perfectly and complement each other. Often given as a symbol of love between partners.

800606.name: Love Pendant

800607.desc: Greatly boosts HC and BC drop rate for 3 turns.

dictionary.lore: A tasty bite sized decadent chocolate that is loved by all ages.

800607.name: Chocolates

800608.desc: Hugely boosts HC and BC drop rate for 3 turns.

dictionary.lore: A box of chocolate coated snacks rumored to be both delicious, and full of surprises.

800608.name: Box of Chocolates

800701.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Fire.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Fire. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800701.name: Fire Essence

800702.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Water.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Water. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800702.name: Water Essence

800703.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Earth.
800703.name: Earth Essence

800704.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Thunder.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Thunder. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800704.name: Thunder Essence

800705.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Light.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Light. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800705.name: Light Essence

800706.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Darkness.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Darkness. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800706.name: Dark Essence

800707.desc: A talismanic treasure that is imbued with the power of Orochi.

dictionary.lore: A talismanic treasure that is imbued with the power of Orochi. Once used, the dark power within will tempt you to seek out more.

800707.name: Orochi's Seal

800801.desc: A unique pin used to stylishly bind several materials together.

dictionary.lore: A unique pin used to stylishly bind several materials together. It is said that only a few crafters know how to make that special flowery flourish.

800801.name: Rose Bolt

800802.desc: A bullet with an inscription of a heart, it is said to symbolize a gunpowder romance.

dictionary.lore: A bullet with an inscription of a heart, it is said to symbolize a gunpowder romance. Some, of course, have said that it is an omen of a fiery shotgun wedding.

800802.name: Love Bullet

800803.desc: A brilliantly colored crystal that glows with power.

dictionary.lore: A brilliantly colored crystal that glows with power. Strangely enough, it is said to smell like roses when sniffed--a hazardous choice, considering that it is known to be abrasive to one's lungs.

800803.name: Pink Crystore

800804.desc: A special set of documents detailing how to build a unique set of weapons.

dictionary.lore: A special set of documents detailing how to build a unique set of weapons. Some of these plans require materials that are literally out of this world.

800804.name: VALIS Schematics

800805.desc: A special document detailing one's marriage to a very enthusiastic candidate.

dictionary.lore: A special document detailing one's marriage to a very enthusiastic candidate. A careful reading of the terms reveals several strange requirements, such as "must be able to outrun bullets, shockwaves, and explosions."

800805.name: Marriage Certificate

800901.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure fire.
800901.name: Ignis Shard

800902.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure ice.
800902.name: Algor Shard

800903.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure earth.
800903.name: Terra Shard

800904.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure lightning.
800904.name: Fulgur Shard

800905.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure light.
800905.name: Lux Shard

800906.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure shadow.
800906.name: Umbra Shard

800907.desc: This tome of elemental power unlocks a hero's potential within.
800907.name: Elementum Tome

800908.desc: This tome of greater elemental power unlocks a hero's potential within.
800908.name: Geminus Tome

801001.desc: Recovers HP each turn & slightly reduces BB gauge used during BB

dictionary.lore: A cross shaped wand, used by Mira, a nun known as the "Beansprouts Sister" from the fabled world of elder runes. This wand can be used to channel restorative powers to keep its owner in good health. It is also known to boost the potential of its bearer, granting them endurance that helps them perform vigorous attacks more easily. However, any details regarding its history and origins remain unknown.

801001.name: Mira's Holy Relic

801002.desc: A glowing, rectangular object that is warm to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A glowing, rectangular object that is warm to the touch. It can be used to power a variety of devices. Do not shake or overcharge.

801002.name: Fuel Cell

801003.desc: A mysteriously heavy device that is strangely warm to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A mysteriously heavy device that is strangely warm to the touch. Some say that they can hear a humming sound when they listen to it closely.

801003.name: Mysterious Gadget

801004.desc: A strange device that lets you see faraway things with ease.

dictionary.lore: A strange device that lets you see faraway things with ease. It's surprisingly easy to carry - and just as easy to lose.

801004.name: Mechanical Lens

801005.desc: A mechanical device that has been engineered to perfection.

dictionary.lore: A mechanical device that has been engineered to perfection, it can do a variety of tasks with precise timing. Clean it often.

801005.name: Clockwork Device

801006.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Fire, it feels warm to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Fire, it feels warm to the touch.

801006.name: Fire Lacrima

801007.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Water, it feels cool to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Water, it feels cool to the touch.

801007.name: Water Lacrima

801008.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Earth, it feels soft to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Earth, it feels soft to the touch.

801008.name: Earth Lacrima

801009.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Thunder, it feels electrifying to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Thunder, it feels electrifying to the touch.

801009.name: Thunder Lacrima

801010.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Light, it feels warm to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Light, it feels warm to the touch.

801010.name: Light Lacrima

801011.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Darkness, it feels cold to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Darkness, it feels cold to the touch.

801011.name: Dark Lacrima

801012.desc: A strange, black substance that emits a pungent and aromatic scent.

dictionary.lore: A strange, black substance that emits a pungent and aromatic scent. Those who catch a whiff of the dark ooze are often thrown into an entranced state.

801012.name: Mysterious Essence

801013.desc: A rare metallic ore that is highly prized due its malleability and luster.

dictionary.lore: A rare metallic ore that is highly prized due its malleability and luster. Due to its resemblance to gold, it is often used to craft trinkets of all kinds.

801013.name: Pyrite Ore

801016.desc: A brightly gleaming stone containing trace amounts of Faefire.

dictionary.lore: Legends tell of a divine source of fire granted to the Fae, the first people to walk the land of Aimyhr. The great Starsage Zeruiah was prudent with this power, for its destructive capability was second to none.

801016.name: Fae Blessing

801017.desc: An eerily glowing stone containing trace amounts of Void.

dictionary.lore: When the Voidborn swarmed into Aimyhr, they brought with them an otherworldly blight known as the Void.

801017.name: Void Stone

801018.desc: Slightly hot to the touch, brilliant hues of gold and red flame dance within this mineral containing concentrated Faefire.

dictionary.lore: Faefire was granted as a blessing to Baelfyr, leader of the Kingdoms of Man, in a bid to protect Aimyhr from their otherworldly invaders.

801018.name: Fae Blazing

801019.desc: Ghostly hues of purple and white swirl within this mineral containing concentrated Void.

dictionary.lore: This material appears to be an offshoot of the Ravaging Void, a cataclysmic force that existed around the same time as the earliest touch of life upon the universe. This eternal struggle of life and death—between the all-consuming Void and the rebirth of new life in endless cycles—has existed since the very beginning.

801019.name: Void Gem

801101.desc: The veiled drop of Akachi, overflowing with cosmic energy.

dictionary.lore: The veiled drop of Akachi, overflowing with cosmic energy. A drop of this grants immense knowledge.

801101.name: Veiled Drop

801102.desc: The occult fang of Akachi, overflowing with cosmic energy.

dictionary.lore: The occult fang of Akachi, overflowing with cosmic energy. The fang can pierce even the hardest material known to man.

801102.name: Occult Fang

801103.desc: The mystic stone of Akachi, overflowing with cosmic energy.

dictionary.lore: The mystic stone of Akachi, overflowing with cosmic energy. Armor made from this material can withstand the fiercest of blows.

801103.name: Mystic Stone

801104.desc: The psychic eye of Akachi, overflowing with cosmic energy.

dictionary.lore: The psychic eye of Akachi, overflowing with cosmic energy. The bearer of this eye sees all, and knows all.

801104.name: Psychic Eye

801901.desc: A brittle mineral rumored to be the solidified blood of fallen gods, it pulses with magical power.
801901.name: Godsblood

801902.desc: An obsidian shard that contains the spirit of Mannag. Resonates wtih Kielazar's soul.
801902.name: Mannag's Howl

802001.desc: Broken crystal pieces that radiates a warm power.

dictionary.lore: Broken crystal pieces that radiate a warm, comforting aura. These crystallites appear to be able to absorb harmful energies when exposed to them. Theodor also postulates they could be used as a catalyst if combined with the right materials…

802001.name: Prismatic Crystallite

802002.desc: Luminous liquid in bottles radiating a warm power.

dictionary.lore: Bottles containing luminous liquids that radiate a warm, comforting aura. They appear to be ordinary—if colourful—liquids, but based on his observations and experiments, Theodor concludes that these are solvents used to heighten the powers of magical items.

802002.name: Luminous Solvent

dictionary.lore: A snowflake with a curious aura emanating out of it. It is said that fragments of a powerful charm is assembled using these snowflakes.

802004.desc: A variety of notes, each contained within a small orb.

dictionary.lore: A variety of notes, each contained within a small orb. These orbs exude an aura of coldness, a fact that many people find puzzling, considering their appearance.

802004.name: Kindling Notes

802005.desc: Vektor special engineered Flux. Used for Excelsior Chip.

dictionary.lore:
This specially engineered flux is one of Vektor's crowning achievements. Boasting a Class-S bond strength, it is up to a hundred times stronger than most industrial variants. It can however be easily dissolved by using any good unbonding agent on the market. making mistakes less deadly than they would be.

Bearing a striking similarity to hair styling products, some claim that Vektor might have used this for his gravity-proof coiffure. He vehemently denies this when asked.

802005.name: Excelsior Flux

802006.desc: Vektor special engineered Lead. Used for Excelsior Chip.

dictionary.lore:
This specially crafted spool of lead is used exclusively for the Excelsior series of items that Vektor has lovingly engineered. An important component in any form of electronics, lead creates a bond between contact points. The Excelsior type exceeds all other market types in both durability and conductivity, somehow even positively enhancing the appliance itself.

When questioned on the specifics of how the lead increases performance, Vektor simply winks and say it is a trade secret.

802006.name: Excelsior Lead

802007.desc: Broken chip. Can be restored with Excelsior materials.

dictionary.lore:
This broken chip was once installed in Galene as a modular enhancement to her combat capabilities. However, during her escape from the Corporation, Galene inadvertently destroyed the chip by overloading it during combat with the Security System.

Although it is currently unusable, it can certainly be restored with enough materials on hand.

802007.name: Broken Chip

802008.desc: Appearing as an unremarkable stone at first, closer examination reveals the scintillation hidden within its dark depths.

dictionary.lore: Appearing as an unremarkable—albeit beautiful—stone at first, closer examination reveals the scintillation hidden within its dark depths. As they shine under the keen eye of the observer, one cannot help but sense that something alien is watching them in return. But it's probably just a figment of one's imagination...

802008.name: Orochi's Opal

802009.desc: To the uninitiated, these look like clothing fit for royalty.

dictionary.lore: To the uninitiated, these may look like clothing fit for royalty--nothing more. But to the discerning eye, these artifacts contain unlimited power that can be tapped by those chosen by divinity. Of course, to gain such a blessing is an adventure in itself...

802009.name: Sacred Regalia

802010.desc: Crafted from roughly-hewn pieces of precious rock, these stones pulse with power that they can barely contain.

dictionary.lore: Crafted from roughly-hewn pieces of precious rock, these stones pulse with power that they can barely contain. Many who desire glory and success are naturally drawn to these, unaware that the very jewels they covet have an agenda of their own.

802010.name: Sacred Jadestones

818881.desc: Boosts Def by 360% when Unit's HP drops below 35% & slight boost to BC drop rate when attacking

dictionary.lore: During Leon's early days as a thief, brushes with death had made him realize the importance of survival. He designed a Guardian Cloak that could save him in times of need.

818881.name: Guardian Cloak

818882.desc: Boosts Def by 330% for the first 2 turns & BB gauge fills faster when obtaining BC

dictionary.lore: The magic of the Aegis Cloak is that it gives enemies the illusion of a clean attack while the offense is greatly directed away from the bearer's body.

818882.name: Aegis Cloak

818883.desc: Boost Atk, Def, Rec, and max HP by15% & slight critical rate up

dictionary.lore: A mysterious lantern with an undying flame. Infused with arcane powers that cause it to glow more brightly under a full moon.

818883.name: Mystic Lantern

818884.desc: Boost Atk by 25%, Def, Rec and max HP by 20% & adds high chance of reflecting partial enemy damage

dictionary.lore: A ring of power granted by the gods to challengers who have demonstrated their strength through various trials. It empowers the bearer with great strength, hardened defenses and the ability to mirror damage back against any foe.

818884.name: Providence Ring

818890.desc: Greatly boosts drop rate of BC when attacking & deals extra normal attacks

dictionary.lore: A skull cursed with the restless souls of warriors who lost their lives in the battle of La Veda. A Wicker Man is said to have been guarding it, waiting for the right bearer to grasp it...

818890.name: Hallowed Skull

818891.desc: Boosts BB gauge when attacking & deals extra normal attacks

dictionary.lore: An artifact that grants it's wielders a tremendous surge in necrotic wrath. Each year for centuries, during the season when wails accompanied by the howling of wolves can be heard, it is said that this orb glows with hate...

818891.name: Sinister Orb

818892.desc: Reduces the consumption of BB gauge, boosts Def and max HP by 10% & boosts Atk and Rec by 5%

dictionary.lore: An ornament belonging to a nefarious ruler who once stood alongside the great disciples of Grand Gaia. Over time, corruption and greed consumed him and he craved death more than being a part of a greater cause. After shattering his camaraderie, he ran into exile, in search for his calling.

818892.name: Ihsir's Guise

818895.desc: Greatly boosts BC drop rate when attacking, raises normal hit amount & 30% boost to Atk and Def

dictionary.lore: There are many stories about the origins of this skull. The most common one is that it belonged to a demon who died in an ancient war. Previous bearers have all been rewarded with great strength, and eventually descendedinto madness...

818895.name: Demonic Skull

818896.desc: Damage dealt boosts BB gauge, raises normal hit amount & boosts critical damage

dictionary.lore: Rumor has it that this artifact was found on an altar in an underground labyrinth by a group of explorers. As the leader touched the orb, he lost consciousness. When he woke up, he found that his entire party has disappeared,andin his hands was the same orb, now with shadowy figures that seemed like theyweretrapped within...

818896.name: Ominous Orb

818897.desc: 20% boost to Def, max HP, 5% damage reduction & negates status ailments

dictionary.lore: A weapon forged from memories and relics from a faraway home, this item glows with the light of the otherworldly might found within. A soft hum can be heard whenever it is held by heroes with good hearts, bound by courage and friendship to defend the world against evil.

818897.name: Patriot

818898.desc: Damage dealt enormously boosts Karma, Item drop rates & boosts BB gauge each turn

dictionary.lore: A mysterious gooey substance that oozed out from a strange egg-like object discovered in a pipe from one of Noel's research labs, after a massive water leakage incident had erupted overnight. The goo got devoured by a certain hungry jewel ghost that always tried to sell itself to charity. The next morning, lab personnel were amazed to discover a shiny Golden God blocking the hallway to Noel's chamber.

818898.name: Humble Egg Goo

818900.desc: Boosts HP and Atk by 15%, Def and Rec by 20% & adds chance of slight HP recovery when damaged

dictionary.lore: A mystical snowglobe infused with the essence of winter and its magic.

818900.name: Sacred Snowglobe

818901.desc: Boosts HP and Atk by 20%, Def and Rec by 30% & adds chance of BB gauge boost when damaged

dictionary.lore: The Frozen Myth had long been deemed to be just a legendary stone that people called "The Heart of Winter." It freezes the air around it and is said to bear the soul of the cold season itself. No man can ever hold it with their bare hands as its frost burns any mortal flesh.

818901.name: Frozen Myth

818902.desc: Good boost to BC, HC, Zel, Karma, and Item drop rate

dictionary.lore: A frosted and enchanted gemstone which emits a swirling blurred glow from the inside. Although cool to the touch, it warms the heart and soul of the bearer, giving him great spirit and energy.

818902.name: Advent Solace

818903.desc: 30% boost to Atk and max HP, 40% boost to Def and Rec & probable BB gauge boost when attacked

dictionary.lore: Long deemed unconquerable by mere mortals, this stone was lost within the deep wintertide long ago. It was not until one of the coldest winters known to date passed that it was discovered by a duo who came across it in a forgotten cave, as if the stone had called onto them. Both were immediately ensnared by its power, and a great battle for ownership promptly ensued. Come morning, only one of them walked out of the cave triumphant. The direction the victor took, however, was not towards home, but deeper into the wintertide.

818903.name: Frozen Fantasy

818904.desc: 20% boost to all parameters, damage taken may restore HP & reduces BB gauge required for BB

dictionary.lore: A small, almost unremarkable chunk of gold shaped vaguely like a heart, it contains many warm memories and happy thoughts tempered by a cruel world. The light shining brightly deep within can make even the saddest hearts happy once again. When placed in a toy soldier's chest, it can make him a real boy--almost.

818904.name: Golden Heart

818905.desc: 20% boost to all parameters & boosts BC, HC, Karma drop rates

dictionary.lore: A lifetime of happy holiday memories made whole with a beautiful ornament crafted from precious jewels and metals. Legend has it that the shine of this lovely relic can even make wishes come true, albeit for a limited time. Could there be any truth behind this myth? After all, winter nights are said to be the most magical of all...

818905.name: Shiny Bauble
